field.id.description: The unique identifier of the credential

field.value.description: The token value of the credential

field.createdAt.description: The time when the credential was created

field.expiredAt.description: The time when the credential will expire

field.usedAt.description: The time when the credential was used

field.expiration.description: The time when the credential will expire

field.application.description: The application to which the credential belongs

field.service.description: The service for which the credential is used

field.setLimitation.description: Set the usage limitations for the credential

field.limitedAmount.description: The usage limitation of the credential

field.setExpiration.description: Set the expiration time for the credential

field.usedAmount.description: The quantity of the credential that has been used

message.confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete?
message.confirmDelete.description: Confirm whether to delete the credential

message.introduction.message: Credentials are key to accessing services. You can create a credential by clicking the 'Create' button. You can also view the details of the credential by clicking the 'View' button.

message.learnMore.description: Get more information about the credential

message.maxLimitation.description: The maximum limit you can set
